mapper.select:
SELECT userReplyID,userReplyContent,userreply.`postReplyID`,postReplyContent,userName,userReplyTime FROM userreply JOIN postreply ON userreply.`postReplyID` = postreply.`postReplyID` JOIN user ON userreply.`userID` = user.`userID`
where userReplyContent like '%${searchField}%'
ORDER BY userReplyTime
